actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution to provide for a 50-per centum reduction of the amount of funds available to, of the number of individuals employed as staff for, and of the amount of office space and number of telephone lines available for use by, any committee of the House of Representatives during the Ninety-Seventh Congress.

summary.text: Requires that the amount of funds available to any committee of the House of Representatives during the 97th Congress for investigations, studies, projects, activities, operations, services, and staff personnel shall not exceed 50 percent of the total amount expended for such purposes during the second session of the 96th Congress.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for a 50-per centum reduction of the amount of funds available to, of the number of individuals employed as staff for, and of the amount of office space and number of telephone lines available for use by, any committee of the House of Representatives during the Ninety-Seventh Congress.
